scripts.ui:order-management:build: rm -rf src/order-management/release && parcel build src/order-management/index.html --out-dir src/order-management/release --public-url ./
scripts.ui:order-management:package: npm run ui:order-management:build && ax apps package src/order-management/ax-manifest.yml
scripts.ui:dashboard:build: rm -rf src/dashboard/release && parcel build src/dashboard/index.html --out-dir src/dashboard/release --public-url ./
scripts.ui:dashboard:package: npm run ui:dashboard:build && ax apps package src/dashboard/ax-manifest.yml
scripts.node:wago-connector:docker:build-amd64: npm run node:wago-connector:build && docker build -t wago-connector-amd64 -f src/wago-connector/Dockerfile .
scripts.node:wago-connector:docker:build-aarch64: npm run node:wago-connector:build && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t wago-connector-aarch64 -f src/wago-connector/Dockerfile --load .
